<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Currently all users of a global variable have to be non-volatile loads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// or stores of the global type, and the global cannot be stored itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (auto &#42;Store = dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;(U))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlight">             Store-&gt;getValueOperand()-&gt;getType() == GV-&gt;getValueType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (auto &#42;Load = dyn&#95;cast&lt;LoadInst&gt;(U))</span></CodeLine>
